vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ki.4.12;
son of: Ahilud (H0286);
brother of: Jehoshaphat (H3092)
§ Baana or Baanah = "in the affliction"
1) the son of Ahilud, Solomon's commissariat officer in Jezreel and the north of the Jordan valley
2) another of Solomon's officers
3) father of Zadok who assisted in rebuilding the wall of Jerusalem under Nehemiah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Ahilud; funcionario; en tiempos del rey Salomón; (b)   hijo de Husai; funcionario; en tiempos del rey Salomón
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
巴拿 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "憂傷"
1) 亞希律的兒子, 所羅門王的後勤官, 在耶斯列和約旦河谷以北之地負責王室
所需的供應 (王上 4:12)
2) 所羅門王手下的另一位高官 (王上 4:16)
3) 撒督的父親, 撒督曾協助尼希米重建耶路撒冷城牆的工作 (尼 3:4)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
巴拿 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "忧伤"
1) 亚希律的儿子, 所罗门王的后勤官, 在耶斯列和约旦河谷以北之地负责王室
所需的供应 (王上 4:12)
2) 所罗门王手下的另一位高官 (王上 4:16)
3) 撒督的父亲, 撒督曾协助尼希米重建耶路撒冷城墙的工作 (尼 3:4)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ki.4.16;
son of: Hushai (H2365)
§ Baana or Baanah = "in the affliction"
1) the son of Ahilud, Solomon's commissariat officer in Jezreel and the north of the Jordan valley
2) another of Solomon's officers
3) father of Zadok who assisted in rebuilding the wall of Jerusalem under Nehemiah

A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.3.4;
father of: Zadok (H6659J)
§ Baana or Baanah = "in the affliction"
1) the son of Ahilud, Solomon's commissariat officer in Jezreel and the north of the Jordan valley
2) another of Solomon's officers
3) father of Zadok who assisted in rebuilding the wall of Jerusalem under Nehemiah
